Edges-Power -- Male Dragonfolk Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Obese: -1 Strength Step (worn gear)
Cold-Blooded: 10 min in 60F/18C or below inflicts -1 Agility, Strength, and Vigor
Skills (20 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d8
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d10 Thievery: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Fighting: (agi) d8 Stealth: (agi) d4
Skill Notes: Mean: -1 Persuasion
Size: 1
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 8; Skill: 8
Description Notes: Obese: +1 Size
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Druid); Artificer; Battle Magic; Blood Magic; Epic Mastery; Familiar; Favored Power; Master Artificer; Mystic Powers (Barbarian); Mystic Powers (Fighter); Mystic Powers (Monk); Mystic Powers (Paladin); Mystic Powers (Ranger); Mystic Powers (Rogue); Silent Caster; Transfer Hindrances: Enemy; Mean; Obese; Shamed Dragonfolk Abilities: Armor +2; Bite; Breath Weapon; Claws; Cold-Blooded; Environmental Resistance (Heat); Environmental Weakness (Cold); Ill-Tempered
Feature Notes:
Arcane Background (Druid): Has Armor Interference, Material Components+, Miracles, One With Nature, Vow+, and Wilderness Stride features
Ill-Tempered: Has Arrogant+ feature
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Miracles: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Miracles)
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: None Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Bite (d8+d4); Claws (d8+d4); Cutlass (d8+d6); Falchion (d8+d8 AP 1); Scythe (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor+2: +2 Armor
Bite: Fangs are a natural weapon
Claws: Claws are a natural weapon
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step/+1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Arrogant+: Always takes on the biggest threat
Breath Weapon: Successful Athletics inflicts 2d6 fire damage in a 9" cone or 12" line; critical failure inflicts Fatigue on self
Environmental Resistance (Heat): +4 vs. heat and fire effects/-4 damage from heat and fire
Environmental Weakness (Cold): -4 vs. cold effects/+4 damage from cold
Wilderness Stride: Suffers no movement penalty for difficult ground in natural terrain
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 70
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druid): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Barbarian): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Fighter): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Monk): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Paladin): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Ranger): 10 Power Points
Mystic Powers (Rogue): 10 Power Points
Armor Interference: In medium or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Artificer: May give items arcane powers
Battle Magic: May cast spells on units of Extras
Blood Magic: Inflicting a Wound on a conscious, sapient being restores d6 Power Points to self
Epic Mastery: May use Epic Power Modifiers
Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Favored Power: Ignores 2 points of penalties when casting chosen power
Master Artificer: Gains 1000 GP progress for each success and raise when imbuing magic items
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
Mystic Powers (Barbarian)-1: May cast self Boost Trait, Smite, or Speed for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Fighter)-1: May cast self Boost Trait, Protection, or Smite for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Monk)-1: May cast self Boost Trait, Deflection, or Smite for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Paladin)-1: May cast self Boost Trait, Healing, self Protection, self Sanctuary or self Smite for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Ranger)-1: May cast Beast Friend, self Boost Trait, Entangle, or self Farsight for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Rogue)-1: May cast self Boost Trait, self Darksight, Lock/Unlock or self Wall Walker for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
One With Nature: Summon Animal and Shape Change (natural animal) last 1 hr
Silent Caster: May use powers w/out speaking
Transfer: May transfer up to 5 PP to another in sight
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 4 available vs. 16 allocated
